content: FrequentGuest basic tier: Earn 1 point per $1 spent. Redeem for room upgrades after 5 stays.
metadata: Sign-up code: FG-1X, valid at all properties, excludes taxes/fees

content: Silver tier: 2 points per $1, priority check-in line, late checkout if available.
metadata: Threshold: 10 paid nights in a calendar year, code: FG-2X

content: Gold tier: 3 points per $1, free breakfast, 1 category room upgrade guaranteed.
Platinum tier: 4 points per $1, lounge access where available, suite upgrade subject to availability.
metadata: Threshold: 35 nights/year, code: FG-4X, includes phone concierge

content: Corporate loyalty: shareable points among employees, annual spend must exceed $50k.
metadata: Program code: BizCollect, includes meeting room discounts
